links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) ~ 2n log n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 07 2012
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(600) | p mod 7 in {2, 3, 4} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 07 2012(PARI) select(n->n%7>1 && n%7<5, primes(60)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 07 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
